title: Reduce celebration text size and move below image

requirements.summary: Reduce celebration score text font size and reposition it below the celebration image
acceptanceCriteria: Celebration text appears directly below the team celebration image
Text size is visibly smaller than current implementation
Layout maintains proper spacing between image and text
Changes apply to both left and right team celebrations

file_operations.description: Modify the CelebrationOverlay component layout to position the celebration score text below the celebration image instead of centered on the screen. Reduce the font size of the text to make it visibly smaller. Update the flex layout structure to stack the image and text vertically while maintaining proper spacing. Ensure changes apply to both left-aligned and right-aligned team celebrations.
